title: [Large-Scale] Classroom Behavior Management Performance Support System Design: Applying the Advance Organizer Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational technology and behavioral management theories
context.additional_context: Focuses on cultivating practical system design abilities applicable to educational settings, based on work experience as professionals.

learning_goals: The conceptual interrelationships between modules in a classroom behavior management system can be designed based on the advance organizer theory
The information hierarchy within a PSS (Performance Support System) can be visually represented using a matrix design metaphor
A PSS prototype supporting collaboration can be developed for execution in smartphone environments
A reference system design plan supporting idea-sharing between teachers and parents can be proposed

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
